Recent articles

2023

  1. MAG-Edit:Localized Image Editing in Complex Scenarios via Mask-Based Attention-Adjusted Guidance
    Qi Mao, Lan Chen, Yuchao Gu, Zhen Fang, and Mike Zheng Shou (2023).
    arXiv preprint arXiv:2312.11396
  2. ZGaming:Zero-latency 3D cloud gaming by image prediction
    Jiangkai Wu, Yu Guan, Qi Mao, Yong Cui, Zongming Guo, and Xinggong Zhang (2023).
    Proceedings of the ACM SIGCOMM 2023 Conference
  3. Overview of intelligent video coding:from model-based to learning-based approaches
    Siwei Ma, Junlong Guo, Ruofan Wang, Jianhui Chang, Qi Mao, Zhimeng Huang, and Chuanmin Jia (2023).
    Visual Intelligence 1
  4. Extreme Image Compression using Fine-tuned VQGAN Models
    Qi Mao, Tinghan Yang, Yinuo Zhang, Shuyin Pan, Meng Wang, Shiqi Wang, and Siwei Ma (2023).
    arXiv preprint arXiv:2307.08265
  5. Semantic-Aware Visual Decomposition for Image Coding
    Jianhui Chang, Jian Zhang, Jiguo Li, Shiqi Wang, Qi Mao, Chuanmin Jia, Siwei Ma, and Wen Gao (2023).
    International Journal of Computer Vision
  6. Extreme Generative Human-Oriented Video Coding via Motion Representation Compression
    Ruofan Wang, Qi Mao, Chuanmin Jia, Ronggang Wang, and Siwei Ma (2023).
    2023 IEEE International Symposium on Circuits and Systems (ISCAS)
  7. Enhancing Style-Guided Image-to-Image Translation via Self-Supervised Metric Learning
    Qi Mao, and Siwei Ma (2023).
    IEEE Transactions on Multimedia
